publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1204.2 Jim Hume: Scottish Biodiversity Strategy Reportâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-1204) in the name of Michael Russell, insert at end "notes that land users, land managers, inshore fishery interests, sea fishing interests and land practitioners are charged with delivering environmental benefits, and recognises that there is a need for these stakeholders in particular to be formally involved in the strategy at all levels, to understand the objectives, and thereafter to contribute practical solutions to the strategy and its overall aim."
